ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Shockwave: Shockwave, amused as he closed in on the Ark, activated his targeting scanners.  Getting a lock, he fired two missiles at the ancient craft.

Shockwave:

Shockwave, amused as he closed in on the Ark, activated his targeting 
scanners.  Getting a lock, he fired two missiles at the "ancient" craft.  
Lifting up, he sped up to Mach 2, hoping to rattle the puny fools' cages.  
Rocketing through the air fast, he made no noise other than that of his 
engines.
